name: HAZLETON AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT and James Correale, Jr., Appellees, v. LUZERNE INTERMEDIATE UNIT 18 and Pat Capece, Appellants
name_abbreviation: Hazleton Area School District v. Luzerne Intermediate Unit 18

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, JJ.
HUTCHINSON, Former J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: HAZLETON AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT and James Correale, Jr., Appellees, v. LUZERNE INTERMEDIATE UNIT 18 and Pat Capece, Appellants.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
This appeal is dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
HUTCHINSON, Former J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Anthony J. Lupas, Robert Panowicz, Wilkes-Barre, for appellants.
James S. Palermo, Hazleton, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
544 A.2d 445
HAZLETON AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT and James Correale, Jr., Appellees, v. LUZERNE INTERMEDIATE UNIT 18 and Pat Capece, Appellants.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 24, 1987.
Decided July 27, 1988.
Anthony J. Lupas, Robert Panowicz, Wilkes-Barre, for appellants.
James S. Palermo, Hazleton, for appellees.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, JJ.
